Export.Routine: MIF412(mi) ; ML 10/8/99 ; ASTM protocol - DIAGNOSTICA STAGO (Bi-Directional) s mi=$g(mi) i '$l(mi) q k ^TMIF(mi,10) s $zt="err^MIF000" i $$select^LVBMIMP(mi) q f j=1:1:PLIST s @("par"_j)=PLIST(j) s stx=$c(2),etx=$c(3),ack=$c(6),enq=$c(5),eot=$c(4) s lf=$c(10),cr=$c(13),nak=$c(21),(result,epis)="" i $$start^MIF000() q f d Main i $$stop^MIF000() q c par4 q Main r *R:10 e d q .d:" L "[(" "_par9_" ") loadlist^MIF000(mi) i $c(R)=enq d .d trace^MIF000(mi,"ENQ","H<--M") .d ACK .f r *R:10 q:$c(R)=eot d ..i $c(R)'=stx q ..s record=$$read^MIF000("",lf) q:'$l(record) ..s record=$e(record,1,$l(record)-1) ..d trace^MIF000(mi,$tr(record,$c(13,3)," "),"H<--M") .. ; check record validity ..s chsum=$p(record,etx,2),chrecord=$p(record,etx,1)_etx ..i $$CHSUM(chrecord)'=chsum d q ...w nak,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"NAK","H-->M") ..d ACK .. ; query record ..i $e(record,2)="Q" d q ...s epis=$p($p($p(record,"|",3),"^",2),cr) ...i $l(epis),$d(^TEPI(epis,1)) s ^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis)="" q ...s suffix=$e(epis,$l(epis)),epis=$e(epis,1,$l(epis)-1) ...i $l(epis),$d(^TEPI(epis,1)) s ^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis)=suffix q .. ; header record ..i $e(record,2)="H" d q ...d Last s (sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC)="" .. ; patient record ..i $e(record,2)="P" d q ...s surname=$tr($tr($p(record,"|",6)," "),"^"," ") .. ; order record ..i $e(record,2)="O" d q ...s epis=$tr($p($p(record,"|",3),"^",1)," "),QC=$tr($p(record,"|",12)," ") s:'$l(epis) epis=$tr($p($p(record,"|",4),"^",1)," ") ...s cup=$p($p(record,"|",4),"^",3) ...i QC="Q" s QC=cup_"\"_epis .. ; result record ..i $e(record,2)="R" d q ...s x1=$tr($p($p(record,"|",3),"^",4)," ")_$tr($p($p(record,"|",3),"^",8)," "),x2=$tr($p(record,"|",4)," "),x3=$tr($p(record,"|",7)," ") ...i $l(x1),$l(x2) s result=result_x1_$c(par10)_x2_$c(par10)_x3_$c(par11) ... ; date and time ...i $l($tr($p(record,"|",13)," ")) d ....s date=$$intdate^SSUTIL4($e($p(record,"|",13),5,6)_"/"_$e($p(record,"|",13),7,8)_"/"_$e($p(record,"|",13),1,4)) ....s time=($e($p(record,"|",13),9,10)*3600)+($e($p(record,"|",13),11,12)*60) .. ; last record ..i $e(record,2)="L" d Last q .d trace^MIF000(mi,$s($c(R)=eot:"EOT",1:R),"H<--M") .d ORDER q Last ; file result if exist i epis?1.99AN,$l(result) d file^MIF000(mi,sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC) s (sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC)="" q ORDER ; create list of orders if exists s epis="" f s epis=$o(^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis)) q:epis="" d .d scanone^MIF000(mi,epis) .d PATDET(epis) .s (tc,tcx)="" .i $d(^TMP("MIF-SINGLE",$j,mi,epis)) f N=1:1 s tc=$o(^TMP("MIF-SINGLE",$j,mi,epis,tc)) q:tc="" d ..s:$l(tcx) tcx=tcx_"\" s tcx=tcx_"^^^"_tc .d SET(epis,tcx) .i '$d(^TMP("MIF-SINGLE",$j,mi,epis)) d SET(epis,"") .s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="L|1|F" .k ^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis) .d Send q SAVE(mi) ; create loadlist records s epis=^TMP("MIF000",$j,"LL","EPISODE"),epis=$p(epis,$c(1),1) s sample=^TMP("MIF000",$j,"LL","SAMPLE") d PATDET(epis) s (tc,tcx)="" f s tc=$o(^TMP("MIF000",$j,"LL","TEST",tc)) q:tc="" d .q:tcx=$e(tc,1,$l(tc)-1) s tcx=$e(tc,1,$l(tc)-1) .d SET(epis,tcx) q 0 PATDET(epis) ; set patient details record i '$$select^LVBEPVIS(epis) d q .f j=1:1:PLIST i $d(PLIST) s PLIST(j)=$p(PLIST(j),$c(1)) .s sex=$s($g(PLIST(5))="M":"M",$g(PLIST(5))="F":"F",1:"U") .s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="P|1||||"_$g(PLIST(3))_"^"_$g(PLIST(4))_"|||"_sex_"|||||"_$g(PLIST(15)) s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="P|1||||^||||||||" q SET(epis,tcx) ; set record to be sent to instrument i $l(tcx) s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="O|"_N_"|"_epis_"||"_tcx_"|||||||N||||||||||||||O,Q" i '$l(tcx) s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="Q|1|^"_epis_"||^^^ALL||||||||X" q Send ; send list of orders if exists w enq,*-3 f j=1:1:10 r *R:1 i $c(R)=ack!($c(R)=enq) q i $c(R)=enq q i $c(R)'=ack w eot,*-3 q q:$$SEND("1H|\^&|||99^2.00|||||||P|1.00") s x="" f FRAME=2:1 s x=$O(^TMIF(mi,10,x)) q:x="" q:$$SEND(FRAME#8_^TMIF(mi,10,x)) i x="" k ^TMIF(mi,10) w eot,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"EOT","H-->M") q SEND(str) ; send string to instrument s str=str_cr_etx,chsum=$$CHSUM(str) w stx,str,chsum,cr,lf,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,str_chsum,"H-->M") f j=1:1:6 r *R:1 i ($c(R)=ack)!($c(R)=eot) q i $c(R)=ack d trace^MIF000(mi,"ACK","H<--M") q 0 i $c(R)=eot d trace^MIF000(mi,"EOT","H<--M") q 1 d trace^MIF000(mi,R,"H<--M") q 2 CHSUM(x) ; calculate check sum n (x) s z=0 f y=1:1:$l(x) s z=z+$a(x,y) s z=$e("0123456789ABCDEF",z#256\16+1)_$e("0123456789ABCDEF",z#16+1) q z ACK ; send 'ack' to instrument w ack,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"ACK","H-->M") q NEXTTRAY(tray) q tray
